akn:section.akn:heading: Construction of Coast Guard vessels and assignment of vessel projects

akn:content.akn:p: § 952. Construction of Coast Guard vessels and assignment of vessel projects The assignment of Coast Guard vessel conversion, alteration, and repair projects shall be based on economic and military considerations and may not be restricted by a requirement that certain parts of Coast Guard shipwork be assigned to a particular type of shipyard or geographical area or by a similar requirement. (Added Pub. L. 115–282, title III, § 310(a), Dec. 4, 2018, 132 Stat. 4248.)
